title: The new Vivo X80 Pro packs improved cameras and comes in Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 and Dimensity 9000 flavors
content:
Following weeks of leaks, the highly-anticipated Vivo X80 series is now official. While last year’s Vivo X70 series featured three models, there are only two models in the 2022 lineup: the Vivo X80 Pro and Vivo X80. The new phones bring numerous improvements over their predecessors, packing better displays, faster chipsets, improved cameras, and much

The post The new Vivo X80 Pro packs improved cameras and comes in Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 and Dimensity 9000 flavors appeared first on XDA.
description: The Vivo X80 Pro and Vivo X80 are official. Both phones pack impressive camera hardware, including the company's V1 Plus imaging chip and Zeiss optics.
